Sentencas: The aim of this work was to study the electrical and electrochemical properties of the (Ba1 -aEuro parts per thousand x Ca (x) )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O-3 solid solutions.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: The powders of different calcium content (x = 0, 0.05, 0.1, and 1) were prepared by a thermal decomposition of organo-metallic precursors containing ethylenediaminetetraacetate acid.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction analysis showed that a small substitution of calcium for barium caused formation of cubic solid solutions with the decreasing cell parameters.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity measurements were performed by the d.c. four-probe method in controlled gas atmospheres containing Ar, air, H-2, and/or H2O at temperature from 300 to 800 A degrees C.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: It was found that the conductivity depended on a chemical composition of the samples and the atmosphere.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: Overall, the electrical conductivity was higher in wet atmospheres that contained oxygen that was in accordance with the model of a proton transport in perovskite structure which assumed the presence of the oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: The solid solution containing 5 mol% of calcium showed the highest conductivity and the lowest activation energy of conductivity regardless of the atmospheres; this can be attributed to the local changes in the cubic perovskite structure.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution

Sentencas: Test results for CaZr0.9Y0.1O3 used as an electrolyte in solid oxide galvanic cells involving CaCr2O4 as a reference electrode are also reported.
Titulo: Ceramic electrolytes based on (Ba1-aEuroparts per thousandx Ca x )(Zr0.9Y0.1)O3 solid solution
